imdb.plot outline: A single woman migrated to US from Iran (Christian Armenian) lives in Hollywood then West Hollywood experiences with all crazy the dates. While running into many needy/loser/want-free-sex/strange/uncommitted/cheaters/and Robots, she is trying to adjust to the culture of American-style-game-playing-Dating. She had to read books like "The Rules". "How to find your husband", "Men are from Mars and Women are from Venus!" After unlimited pressure from her family, she chose to live alone and independently But she runs into unbelievable character, including her ex=boyfriend that calls her 11 years after break up, worrying about Lala is effected by Lala. Lala responds I am very safe by getting checked for STDS and I don't leap around. Lala's option is to choose a Robot Man to pretend that he is her boyfriend.
